code: import React from"react";import"./routesCss/Recommendations.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Recommendations=function Recommendations(props){var recommendations=props.recommendations;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"RecommendationsDiv",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"recommendTitle",children:"Letters of Recommendations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Recommendations",children:recommendations.map(function(letter){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"RecommendationsContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:letter.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"letterImageDiv",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"letterImage",alt:"",src:letter.thumbnail,width:"100%"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:letter.id,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"letterName",children:["Name: ",letter.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"position",children:["Position: ",letter.position]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"company",children:["Company: ",letter.company]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{method:"get",action:letter.file,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btnletterLink",type:"submit",children:"Click here to view"})})]})]},letter.id);})})]});};export default Recommendations;
